sections.content: Bucks Run ski trail will be groomed today, March 7, 2025.  The north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The Nubs Knob upper loops had a buttery fresh groom of light new snow on top of a firm flat deck : SWEET ! LF7Tomorrow should be just as great .

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The last day of the trail opening was listed as Sunday March 9. The last loop was not groomed only front portion. Trail was icy in spots both skate and traditional was usable.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Daily through this Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful day at Nub's Nob. The sun is out this morning and thanks to some fresh snow overnight the conditions are very good. The corduroy feels like it is back to mid-winter type of snow. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The M/D/V Speed Series concludes tonight with a GS on Scarface. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
